QuestData.Title: A Rough Ride
QuestData.Description: Zepik is best hunter of the Frenzyheart. Zepik hunts big-tongues... ugly things near swamps that try to steal all stuff they can find.$B$BZepik going on long trek to break big-tongue shrine and try to scare them away. We no want big-tongues in this land anymore.$B$BThere a crocolisk chained on northeast side of hill, next to tree - go with Zepik and do what Zepik tell you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the captive crocolisk to Mistwhisper Refuge and then speak to Zepik for further instructions.$B$BIf you lose Zepik's Hunting Horn, speak to Elder Harkek in Frenzyheart Hill.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Zepik the Gorloc Hunter. Zepik can be summoned using Zepik's Hunting Horn if he is not nearby.
QuestData.CompletionText: They tell Zepik you good hunter for not being Frenzyheart.
QuestData.RewardText: We here! Must work fast.$B$BWatch out for big-tongues.
